basics.name: Anonymous
basics.label: Information Technology Manager
basics.summary: Successful fifteen years of experience in IT Management and Technical Support. Skilled in installation, configuration, migration and implementation of server platforms. Dedicated IT Manager well-versed in analyzing and mitigating risk and finding cost-effective solutions. Experience in strategic planning, designing, and budgeting for new products. Excellent troubleshooting skills in network, servers, and software applications.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provide leadership, vision, and management to the IT department. Develop Capitol Budget, monitor, and approve department expenditures. Manage, monitor, and maintain the network infrastructure. Managed IT Staff, scheduling, performance review, training, hiring, termination, and disciplinary action. Maintain Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards of information systems. Research new technologies and calculate future needs to achieve capacity planning. Managed technology documents, maintenance agreements & service contracts.
highlights: Guided company to comply with PCI Data Security Standard and got it certified
Migrated Analog phone system to VOIP, saving over $40K a year in costs
Migrated 80% of physical servers to Hyper-V to save cost and improve productivity

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised a team of 15 Computer quality inspectors and 8 software evaluators. Coordinated quality assurance of new product development and prototypes. Managed Documentation Control for all hardware and software. Assessed product viability and planned improvement and modifications.

work.name: Company
work.summary: Supervised a team of 25 computer assemblers, 3 testers and 6 technicians. Organised computer assembly and testing for daily production. Provided resolutions to engineering, Logistics and Management.
